articles.author: Ron Miller
articles.title: John Stones' recovery from England mistake impresses Gareth Southgate in crucial win over Poland
articles.description: Stones' mistake led to Jakub Moder's equaliser after Harry Kane's first-half penalty, but Stones towered above his man from a corner to set up Harry Maguire's winner as England made it three wins from three in World Cup Qualifying

articles.author: Lucas Matney
articles.title: Man City targeting Haaland as Aguero replacement, Kane also on shortlist
articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is targeting Erling Braut Haaland as Sergio Aguero's replacement - but there are other options if he misses out on the Norwegian, and they include England skipper Harry Kane.

articles.author: Connie Loizos
articles.title: Bayern plan Son bid
articles.description: Bayern Munich are watching with interest as Son Heung-min remains without a contract extension at Tottenham and are considering a bid at some point, reports Football Insider.

articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Kane becomes England's all-time leading penalty scorer with Poland spot kick
articles.description: Kane opened the scoring in the 19th minute of the World Cup qualifier at Wembley, before Poland equalised in the 58th minute through Jakub Moder.
